Title: It Was the Son
Writer: Roberto Alajmo (novel), Daniele Ciprì (screenplay), Massimo Gaudioso (screenplay), Miriam Rizzo (collaborating writer)
Actors: Toni Servillo, Giselda Volodi, Alfredo Castro, Aurora Quattrocchi
Plot: Palermo in the 1970s. The Ciraulos are modest scrap dealers whose uneventful lives are turned upside down the day their youngest daughter is accidentally killed by clumsy killers. Their ...
